mapper.select: SELECT info.licence_type, info.plate_number, info.brand_model, rel.price, rel.purchase_date, rel.depreciated_month, rel.residual FROM vehicle_data_info info LEFT JOIN tenant_vehicle_cost_rel rel ON info.plate_number = rel.plate_number LEFT JOIN tenant_vehicle_rel rels on info.id = rels.vehicle_code where info.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and rels.vehicle_class=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tenant_vehicle_zc (licenceType, brandModel, zcjz, syzjqs, zcdyzj, plate_number, states, xingzhi) VALUES (#{licenceType}, #{brandModel}, #{zcjz}, #{syzjqs}, #{zcdyzj}, #{plateNumber}, #{states}, #{xingzhi})

INSERT INTO tenant_vehicle_zc (licenceType, brandModel, zcjz, syzjqs, zcdyzj, plate_number, states, xingzhi) VALUES (#{licenceType}, #{brandModel}, #{zcjz}, #{syzjqs}, #{zcdyzj}, #{plateNumber}, #{states}, #{xingzhi})

INSERT INTO tenant_vehicle_zc (licenceType, brandModel, zcjz, syzjqs, zcdyzj, trailer_number, states, xingzhi) VALUES (#{licenceType}, #{brandModel}, #{zcjz}, #{syzjqs}, #{zcdyzj}, #{trailerNumber}, #{states}, #{xingzhi})
mapper.select: SELECT man.trailer_number, rel.price, rel.purchase_date, rel.depreciated_month, rel.residual from trailer_management man RIGHT JOIN tenant_trailer_rel rel on man.trailer_number = rel.trailer_number where man.tenant_id = #{tenantId} GROUP BY man.trailer_number

SELECT zc.id,zc.plate_number,zc.licenceType, info.brand_model, zc.states,zc.xingzhi,zc.zcjz zcjzze , zc.syzjqs syzjqsze , zc.zcdyzj zcdyzjze, count(zc.id)count,info.light_goods_square as rj , info.vehicle_model as ppxh, info.vehicle_length, info.vehicle_status,info.engine_no,info.vin_no from tenant_vehicle_zc zc LEFT JOIN vehicle_data_info info on zc.plate_number = info.plate_number RIGHT JOIN tenant_vehicle_rel rel ON rel.plate_number = info.plate_number where zc.licenceType = 1 GROUP BY zc.id

SELECT zc.id,zc.plate_number,zc.licenceType, info.brand_model,zc.states,zc.xingzhi, zc.zcjz zcjzze , zc.syzjqs syzjqsze , zc.zcdyzj zcdyzjze, count(zc.id)count,info.light_goods_square as rj , info.vehicle_model as ppxh, info.vehicle_length, info.vehicle_status,info.engine_no,info.vin_no from tenant_vehicle_zc zc LEFT JOIN vehicle_data_info info on zc.plate_number = info.plate_number RIGHT JOIN tenant_vehicle_rel rel ON rel.plate_number = info.plate_number where zc.licenceType = 2 GROUP BY zc.id

SELECT zc.id,zc.trailer_number,zc.licenceType, zc.brandModel,zc.states,zc.xingzhi, zc.zcjz zcjzze , zc.syzjqs syzjqsze , zc.zcdyzj zcdyzjze, count(zc.id)count,man.trailer_status,man.trailer_material,man.trailer_volume,man.vin_no from tenant_vehicle_zc zc LEFT JOIN trailer_management man on zc.trailer_number = man.trailer_number RIGHT JOIN tenant_trailer_rel rel on man.trailer_number = rel.trailer_number where zc.licenceType = 3 GROUP BY zc.id

SELECT zc.id,zc.licenceType,COUNT(zc.id)count,SUM(zc.zcjz)zcjzze, SUM(zc.syzjqs)syzjqsze, SUM(zc.zcdyzj)zcdyzjze from tenant_vehicle_zc zc where licenceType = 1 UNION ALL SELECT zc.id,zc.licenceType,COUNT(zc.id)count,SUM(zc.zcjz)zcjzze, SUM(zc.syzjqs)syzjqsze, SUM(zc.zcdyzj)zcdyzjze from tenant_vehicle_zc zc where licenceType = 2 UNION ALL SELECT zc.id,zc.licenceType,COUNT(zc.id)count,SUM(zc.zcjz)zcjzze, SUM(zc.syzjqs)syzjqsze, SUM(zc.zcdyzj)zcdyzjze from tenant_vehicle_zc zc where licenceType = 3

SELECT distinct a.id as id, a.plate_number AS plateNumber, a.licence_type AS licenceType, a.brand_model AS brandModel, 1 AS count, idle AS states, '自有' AS xingzhi, 0.00 AS zcjzze, 0 AS syzjqsze, 0.00 AS zcdyzjze, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,c.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) <0 then 0 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,c.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'))=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,c.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) >0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,c.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'))>0 and (DATE_FORMAT(c.purchase_date, '%d' ) - DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%d' ))<>0 then TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,c.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) +1 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,c.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) end as dqzjys, c.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, c.depreciated_month AS depreciatedMonth, c.price AS price, c.residual AS residual, a.vehicle_status AS vehicleStatus, a.vehicle_length AS vehicleLength, a.vehicle_model AS ppxh, NULL AS caizhi, a.light_goods_square AS rj, a.engine_no AS engineNo, a.vin_no AS vinNo FROM vehicle_data_info AS a LEFT JOIN tenant_vehicle_rel AS b ON a.id = b.vehicle_code LEFT JOIN tenant_vehicle_cost_rel AS c ON a.id = c.vehicle_code and b.id=c.rel_id WHERE b.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND b.vehicle_class = 1 UNION ALL SELECT a.id as id, a.trailer_number AS plateNumber, 3 AS licenceType, a.brand_model AS brandModel, 1 AS count,-- 数量 a.idle AS states, '自有' AS xingzhi, 0.00 AS zcjzze, 0 AS syzjqsze, 0.00 AS zcdyzjze, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,b.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) <0 then 0 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,b.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'))=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,b.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) >0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,b.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'))>0 and (DATE_FORMAT(b.purchase_date, '%d' ) - DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%d' ))<>0 then TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,b.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) +1 else TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,b.purchase_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) end as dqzjys, b.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, b.depreciated_month AS depreciatedMonth, b.price AS price, b.residual AS residual, a.trailer_status AS vehicleStatus, a.trailer_length AS vehicleLength, NULL AS ppxh, a.trailer_material AS caizhi, a.trailer_volume AS rj, NULL AS engineNo, NULL AS vinNo FROM trailer_management AS a LEFT JOIN tenant_trailer_rel AS b ON a.id = b.trailer_id WHERE a.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND b.trailer_owner_ship = 1 ORDER BY licenceType
